LABEL: 0x2C2
STRING: The dim reference room was illuminated by the light of the monitor.

LABEL: 0x2F8
STRING: The girl stood out like a ghost.

LABEL: 0x330
STRING: A scene far removed from reality.

LABEL: 0x350
STRING: It felt out of place.

LABEL: 0x36C
STRING: I tensed up.

LABEL: 0x388
STRING: What...?

LABEL: 0x3A0
STRING: What was going on...?

LABEL: 0x3C4
STRING: I couldn't say anything.

LABEL: 0x3E0
STRING: I couldn't understand.

LABEL: 0x3FE
STRING: She was relaxed as if mocking our confusion and fear.

LABEL: 0x4F6
STRING: Reiri.

LABEL: 0x50A
STRING: The girl who was found, lost, and found once again.

LABEL: 0x540
STRING: There was no confusion or unease in her eyes, and she confronted us with a face of insolent conviction.

LABEL: 0x594
STRING: I had only known her as a doll-like girl as she slept, so her piercing gaze made me stop.

LABEL: 0x610
STRING: There was a sound of a footstep.

LABEL: 0x62A
STRING: Touri had taken a step forward.

LABEL: 0x6B1
STRING: Her face was grim as she faced her one and only twin sister.

LABEL: 0x6FB
STRING: She looked like she was holding something back... or was that anger reflected on her face?

LABEL: 0x745
STRING: Touri walked right up to her and――

LABEL: 0x79E
STRING: 「Thank goodness...!」

LABEL: 0x7C3
STRING: She hugged her sister as she still sat on the chair.

LABEL: 0x7F5
STRING: Reiri's small frame disappeared almost completely behind Touri.

LABEL: 0x843
STRING: It was an expression of joy and love using her entire body.

LABEL: 0x86F
STRING: Reiri, who was at her mercy, couldn't respond at all.

LABEL: 0x92A
STRING: A reunion between sisters.

LABEL: 0x944
STRING: It was a touching scene.

LABEL: 0x95E
STRING: Was this... how it was supposed to be?

LABEL: 0x98E
STRING: This should be right, but there was something wrong.

LABEL: 0x9C2
STRING: Something was off.

LABEL: 0xA3F
STRING: I turned to Hiragino for help.

LABEL: 0xAF0
STRING: He didn't seem to understand what was going on either.

LABEL: 0xB42
STRING: We had found our missing girl――

LABEL: 0xB72
STRING: And as far as I could tell, she had regained consciousness and was unharmed.

LABEL: 0xBD2
STRING: It was too good to be true... So what was with this feeling in my chest?

LABEL: 0xC1C
STRING: Touri continued hugging Reiri in the midst of our silence.

LABEL: 0xC5E
STRING: Finally, she released her.

LABEL: 0xC8E
STRING: Reiri's head poked out from behind her, having not moved an inch like nothing had happened.

LABEL: 0xD41
STRING: Her eyes were unusually dark――

LABEL: 0xD61
STRING: Was she really alive...? There was an aura of coldness to her.

LABEL: 0xDD7
STRING: On the other hand, Touri looked back at us with a bright red face.

LABEL: 0xE0F
STRING: She must've remembered that Hiragino and I were here too because she suddenly switched to a more serious expression.

LABEL: 0xF2C
STRING: 「Reiri!」

LABEL: 0xF44
STRING: 「Where on earth have you been?!」

LABEL: 0xF72
STRING: 「Everyone was so worried!」

LABEL: 0xFA1
STRING: Touri directed a question to Reiri rather harshly.

LABEL: 0xFC9
STRING: It sounded like she was scolding a five-year-old...

LABEL: 0x1011
STRING: Reiri turned her downcast gaze up toward Touri.

LABEL: 0x1096
STRING: 「Touri.」

LABEL: 0x10B1
STRING: Her voice sent chills down my spine.

LABEL: 0x10EB
STRING: It was by no means loud, nor was it the tone of her voice that made me feel that way.

LABEL: 0x1125
STRING: But her words lingered in my ears as if they were painting a picture.

LABEL: 0x1242
STRING: 「Don't be so loud, Touri.」

LABEL: 0x1274
STRING: 「You look like an idiot.」

LABEL: 0x12FE
STRING: 「Huh?

LABEL: 0x136A
STRING: Oh... yeah...」

LABEL: 0x138D
STRING: Her voice was monotonous and didn't carry any emotion at all.

LABEL: 0x13D3
STRING: It was followed by silence...

LABEL: 0x1446
STRING: However, Reiri immediately%Nbegan to smile.

LABEL: 0x147A
STRING: No, that wasn't something you could call a smile.

LABEL: 0x14B8
STRING: Her mouth was twisted into a terribly sarcastic expression, but she was no doubt smiling.

LABEL: 0x1535
STRING: 「I was here.」

LABEL: 0x156A
STRING: 「Here... in the reference room? All this time?」

LABEL: 0x15A5
STRING: 「That's right.」

LABEL: 0x15FB
STRING: 「I

LABEL: 0x160C
STRING: was here.」

LABEL: 0x162B
STRING: ――That was impossible.

LABEL: 0x1649
STRING: She was clearly lying.

LABEL: 0x166D
STRING: She had said it so boldly, but...

LABEL: 0x169B
STRING: There was no way she was here all this time.

LABEL: 0x16DD
STRING: First of all, Hiragino's team should have checked this room already...

LABEL: 0x174F
STRING: Hiragino stayed silent.

LABEL: 0x176F
STRING: What was he thinking as he watched over the siblings' exchange?

LABEL: 0x17AB
STRING: And, about Touri's sister's lie...

LABEL: 0x18A0
STRING: 「Reiri. You――」

LABEL: 0x18FA
STRING: 「――If that was it, then you have to answer properly.」

LABEL: 0x196A
STRING: 「When we came here earlier, I called out for you, didn't I?」

LABEL: 0x19AA
STRING: 「Or, did you not hear me?」

LABEL: 0x1A3A
STRING: 「Ah, sorry about that.」

LABEL: 0x1A5A
STRING: 「I was just too focused on my work.」

LABEL: 0x1AEE
STRING: 「Honestly... That's a bad habit of yours, losing sight of your surroundings like that.」

LABEL: 0x1B43
STRING: 「I'll be more careful from now on.」

LABEL: 0x1B66
STRING: ...What were these two talking about?

LABEL: 0x1B94
STRING: Even if Reiri hadn't noticed Touri and Hiragino entering the room, they should still have noticed her.

LABEL: 0x1C83
STRING: In that case...

LABEL: 0x1C97
STRING: Was it somehow possible that Hiragino and Touri wouldn't notice her when they came patrolling here? No.

LABEL: 0x1CF5
STRING: There was no way she was in this room the whole time.

LABEL: 0x1D31
STRING: Touri hadn't pointed out anything in response to her obvious lie.

LABEL: 0x1D6B
STRING: Don't tell me she didn't realize.

LABEL: 0x1D9F
STRING: Touri?

LABEL: 0x1DB9
STRING: Was that even possible...?

LABEL: 0x1E40
STRING: 「Hold on a minute, what she's saying is――」

LABEL: 0x1E7A
STRING: I couldn't help but interject.

LABEL: 0x1EF5
STRING: ――Hiragino stopped me instantly.

LABEL: 0x1F1D
STRING: Why?

LABEL: 0x1F31
STRING: There was no way he hadn't noticed Reiri's lie.

LABEL: 0x1F63
STRING: What was he trying to do?

LABEL: 0x1FA9
STRING: I couldn't understand, so I had no choice but to hold my tongue.

LABEL: 0x20A8
STRING: 「Disappearing without saying anything to anyone is bad, you know?」

LABEL: 0x20EC
STRING: 「I've told you many times not to do that, haven't I?」

LABEL: 0x2196
STRING: 「Yeah, sorry.」

LABEL: 0x21B4
STRING: 「I'll make sure not to trouble you anymore.」

LABEL: 0x21FB
STRING: It was like someone admonishing a lost child.

LABEL: 0x222F
STRING: It was hard to believe this was an exchange between a girl and her sister who had gone missing inside a sunken submarine.

LABEL: 0x228B
STRING: That's right. Despite communications being restored, the situation inside the <SHEEP III> hadn't changed.

LABEL: 0x22D8
STRING: And the cause of that was――

LABEL: 0x233B
STRING: 「Reiri-kun.」

LABEL: 0x235A
STRING: Hiragino broke his long silence and addressed Reiri.

LABEL: 0x2455
STRING: 「...I get that you were in this room.」

LABEL: 0x2491
STRING: 「But what exactly were you doing here?」

LABEL: 0x24F9
STRING: A deep darkness was reflected in Hiragino's pupils, who towered over Touri in height.

LABEL: 0x2537
STRING: Hiragino and Reiri.

LABEL: 0x2551
STRING: The two faced each other.

LABEL: 0x25A5
STRING: What she was doing, huh?

LABEL: 0x25C7
STRING: How much did Hiragino know?

LABEL: 0x25FB
STRING: There was no mistaking that Reiri had set up the cracking via the internal network.

LABEL: 0x2665
STRING: I didn't know what for, but Reiri had interfered with the rescue of the <SHEEP III>.

LABEL: 0x26B6
STRING: Did Hiragino ask her knowing that?

LABEL: 0x26EA
STRING: Or...

LABEL: 0x27C2
STRING: Reiri froze for a moment but eventually opened her thin lips.

LABEL: 0x286C
STRING: 「I... was investigating, of course.」

LABEL: 0x28D0
STRING: 「About the cause of this "incident."」

LABEL: 0x2901
STRING: ――At that moment.

LABEL: 0x2919
STRING: Her sharp, snakelike gaze pierced me――

LABEL: 0x2951
STRING: It was only for an instant.

LABEL: 0x2A2F
STRING: The sisters were already conversing by themselves by the time I recovered.

LABEL: 0x2A81
STRING: ...Was it just my imagination?

LABEL: 0x2AA7
STRING: If that wasn't it, what did her look mean?

LABEL: 0x2AE3
STRING: ――Reiri didn't call this an accident, but an incident.

LABEL: 0x2B1B
STRING: Who was she?

LABEL: 0x2B39
STRING: What did she know...?

LABEL: 0x2BCF
STRING: 「Wow, that's amazing, Reiri!」

LABEL: 0x2BFC
STRING: Touri smiled innocently while praising her sister.

LABEL: 0x2C30
STRING: She looked proud of her sister's actions.

LABEL: 0x2C62
STRING: Reiri twisted her lips in response.

LABEL: 0x2D00
STRING: 「So, did you find out anything?」

LABEL: 0x2D37
STRING: 「――Yeah.」

LABEL: 0x2D51
STRING: 「The reason we haven't been able to communicate since yesterday――」

LABEL: 0x2DC5
STRING: 「*Cough*――」

LABEL: 0x2DE6
STRING: Reiri started coughing before she could finish.

LABEL: 0x2E25
STRING: 「Reiri!」

LABEL: 0x2E42
STRING: Touri reached out her hand toward her.

LABEL: 0x2ECC
STRING: 「Don't touch me!」

LABEL: 0x2EEB
STRING: Reiri deflected her sister's hand.

LABEL: 0x2F0B
STRING: She, who had spoken monotonously in a whispering voice so far, revealed her emotions for the first time.

LABEL: 0x2F73
STRING: Hiragino was a step away from rushing over to Reiri, but had now stopped in his tracks.

LABEL: 0x2FC7
STRING: Why had she rejected Touri?

LABEL: 0x2FE7
STRING: Her own sister's goodwill...

LABEL: 0x300B
STRING: Reiri had swung her arm to stop her sister,

LABEL: 0x3047
STRING: but ended up coughing even harder and nearly falling out of her chair.

LABEL: 0x3095
STRING: Touri froze in place for a moment after having her outstretched arm struck, then reached out to Reiri again.

LABEL: 0x3108
STRING: 「Reiri! Hang in there!」

LABEL: 0x313B
STRING: Even with Reiri blocking her with her bony arms, Touri caressed her sister's back.

LABEL: 0x317B
STRING: Despite her show of affection, Reiri tried to shake off her sister to the end.

LABEL: 0x31C9
STRING: Was this some kind of twisted sisterly love...?

LABEL: 0x31EB
STRING: Stunned by the strange back-and-forth unfolding before me, my attention was then drawn to something else entirely.

LABEL: 0x32C3
STRING: 『The reason we haven't been able to communicate since yesterday――』

LABEL: 0x3304
STRING: How did she know that communications with the surface were cut off?

LABEL: 0x33C1
STRING: She was mostly bedridden from yesterday to this morning...

LABEL: 0x3462
STRING: Ever since the <SHEEP III> sank, there shouldn't have been any way for her to know about our current situation or have the time to find out.

LABEL: 0x352C
STRING: Even when she went missing, she didn't come into contact with anyone else...

LABEL: 0x35E6
STRING: Or did one of us get in touch with Reiri?

LABEL: 0x3701
STRING: 「Hah... Hah...」

LABEL: 0x3732
STRING: 「Reiri...」

LABEL: 0x3751
STRING: Her hoarse coughing and resistance subsided eventually.

LABEL: 0x3795
STRING: Touri breathed a sigh of relief when she saw her calm down.

LABEL: 0x37CF
STRING: Reiri glanced at her in annoyance.

LABEL: 0x38D0
STRING: 「You're always making so much noise.」

LABEL: 0x3913
STRING: 「Sorry...」

LABEL: 0x39A8
STRING: 「But when I think about what might happen to you, I...」

LABEL: 0x3A62
STRING: 「Yeah, yeah, I get it.」

LABEL: 0x3ABF
STRING: Reiri's faint voice seemed to have calmed down the panicking Touri.

LABEL: 0x3B18
STRING: 「I'll be counting on you, Nee-san.」

LABEL: 0x3B47
STRING: ――Now she was saying that?

LABEL: 0x3B6B
STRING: She was talking to her in a coaxing voice, like the outburst from earlier never happened.

LABEL: 0x3BB3
STRING: I was dumbfounded by her sudden change.

LABEL: 0x3BE9
STRING: However――

LABEL: 0x3CCE
STRING: 「Reiri...!」

LABEL: 0x3D47
STRING: 「That's right! Just leave everything to me!」

LABEL: 0x3D8E
STRING: Touri was straight up beaming in delight.

LABEL: 0x3DC0
STRING: Even if they were sisters, she was being too naive...

LABEL: 0x3E08
STRING: I couldn't help but wonder if Reiri knew her weak point or something.

LABEL: 0x3EB0
STRING: 「So... We were talking about the communication problem.」

LABEL: 0x3EE5
STRING: Putting aside her excited sister, Reiri returned to her previous emotionless self.

LABEL: 0x3F48
STRING: 「That wasn't a malfunction in the system.」

LABEL: 0x3F7C
STRING: 「As far as I can tell, there was clearly some sort of artificial interference.」

LABEL: 0x4069
STRING: Just what did she mean to say here...?!

LABEL: 0x40CD
STRING: ...This could be bad.

LABEL: 0x40F5
STRING: But... right now, the narrator was Reiri.

LABEL: 0x411F
STRING: I had no grounds to stop her. And besides, it would come off as unnatural and suspicious.

LABEL: 0x4236
STRING: 「Artificial...」

LABEL: 0x4254
STRING: 「So we couldn't contact anyone because of someone...?」

LABEL: 0x428C
STRING: 「W-what do you mean, Reiri?」

LABEL: 0x42CA
STRING: 「It's nothing complicated, Touri.」

LABEL: 0x42FA
STRING: 「This incident was someone's intention...」

LABEL: 0x4336
STRING: 「It wasn't an accident, but an incident.」

LABEL: 0x435C
STRING: 「"Someone" intentionally cut us off from contacting the surface.」

LABEL: 0x43BF
STRING: 「That's――」

LABEL: 0x43E0
STRING: She was stunned.

LABEL: 0x43F8
STRING: Touri was overwhelmed by her reveal.

LABEL: 0x4430
STRING: However, she immediately clenched her fists.

LABEL: 0x44CA
STRING: 「Who would do such a thing...?」

LABEL: 0x44F0
STRING: 「Unforgivable!」

LABEL: 0x4511
STRING: ――Well, this was a problem.

LABEL: 0x4541
STRING: Touri didn't know that it was me who had cut us off to begin with.

LABEL: 0x4583
STRING: Not only that, but up until now, she had thought that the sinking was an accident.

LABEL: 0x45D4
STRING: And now, this "someone" who had sabotaged the <SHEEP III> had earned Touri's ire.

LABEL: 0x4628
STRING: What would she do if she found out it was me...?

LABEL: 0x46C4
STRING: I didn't mean to deceive her.

LABEL: 0x46F6
STRING: I didn't want to sadden Touri by exposing my true identity.

LABEL: 0x473A
STRING: At the very least, I wanted to remain as the man who had rescued her sister to Touri.

LABEL: 0x4796
STRING: ...So, it was just because of my ego, after all.

LABEL: 0x47C4
STRING: If this was going to happen, I should have told her from the start.

LABEL: 0x4806
STRING: How sad would she get if I revealed the truth now?

LABEL: 0x4860
STRING: How much would she hate me?

LABEL: 0x48A0
STRING: The shock, sadness, and hatred would no doubt be amplified over time.

LABEL: 0x48F2
STRING: Even now, I didn't know if I should reveal my true identity...

LABEL: 0x4A15
STRING: 「Could it be that the transmission was cut off just now because of them too?」

LABEL: 0x4A6A
STRING: Reiri's thin lips curled into a happy smile.

LABEL: 0x4B02
STRING: 「――Yeah, that's right.」

LABEL: 0x4B24
STRING: 「You really are clever, Nee-san.」

LABEL: 0x4B89
STRING: What was she...?!

LABEL: 0x4BAF
STRING: I glared at Reiri.

LABEL: 0x4BD5
STRING: The lifeless girl smiled in amusement.

LABEL: 0x4C60
STRING: The cause of the disconnection, the saboteur――

LABEL: 0x4C8C
STRING: I was sure of it... I was sure that she was the one who did it.

LABEL: 0x4CD2
STRING: She generated a large amount of data from the terminal in the library and sent it to the server, overloading the line.

LABEL: 0x4D26
STRING: It was too simple, too classic, too effective of a move.

LABEL: 0x4D72
STRING: Reiri was the only one on this ship who could have done it.

LABEL: 0x4E12
STRING: 「Now then...」

LABEL: 0x4E2C
STRING: 「If you think about it rationally...」

LABEL: 0x4E52
STRING: 「There's a high chance that the person who interfered with the transmission just now is the same as the one who cut us off in the first place...」

LABEL: 0x4F2B
STRING: 「Don't you think so, Katagiri?」

LABEL: 0x4F5C
STRING: She turned her deep, dark eyes to me again.

LABEL: 0x4F88
STRING: I felt the cage closing in on me.

LABEL: 0x4FC6
STRING: Should I go against her here?

LABEL: 0x4FFC
STRING: To someone who didn't know anything about our current situation, Reiri's theory would sound compelling...

LABEL: 0x505C
STRING: I could point out the mistake because I knew the truth...

LABEL: 0x50BE
STRING: But...

LABEL: 0x50D4
STRING: I didn't have enough evidence to prove the existence of two different culprits.

LABEL: 0x5116
STRING: Even if I pleaded my case, would I be able to avoid Reiri's incitement and explain it at all?

LABEL: 0x5234
STRING: In the first place, was there any point in condemning Reiri in front of Touri?

LABEL: 0x5282
STRING: Touri had almost blind adoration towards her from what I'd seen so far.

LABEL: 0x52B6
STRING: In the face of sisterly love, was there any room for the truth...?

LABEL: 0x5318
STRING: ...Damn it.

LABEL: 0x5336
STRING: 「...Yeah.」

LABEL: 0x5350
STRING: 「I think so too.」

LABEL: 0x5372
STRING: Reiri narrowed her eyes even more.

LABEL: 0x5481
STRING: 「If you say so, Katagiri, there can be no doubt about it.」

LABEL: 0x54B5
STRING: 「Isn't that right, Touri?」

LABEL: 0x5545
STRING: 「Yeah! It was Katagiri-san who saved you, you know?」

LABEL: 0x55E5
STRING: Paying no heed to her enthusiastic sister, Reiri operated the terminal in her hand.

LABEL: 0x5631
STRING: With an air of importance, she pressed a key.

LABEL: 0x566B
STRING: The screen blacked out in an instant and turned off.

LABEL: 0x569F
STRING: Before I even realized it, the operating sounds stopped.

LABEL: 0x570F
STRING: She got me――

LABEL: 0x5729
STRING: I failed to obtain my evidence.

LABEL: 0x5749
STRING: Any evidence that Reiri had been interfering with the transmission had just vanished.

LABEL: 0x578F
STRING: How much meaning would circumstantial evidence have under these extreme circumstances?

LABEL: 0x57D7
STRING: I couldn't accuse Reiri anymore...

LABEL: 0x5803
STRING: She stood up.

LABEL: 0x588D
STRING: 「By the way...」

LABEL: 0x58AB
STRING: 「I'd like to go back to my room for now, so could you lend me the key?」

LABEL: 0x58F2
STRING: 「...Room?」

LABEL: 0x5910
STRING: ...Room, she said.

LABEL: 0x5930
STRING: She spent last night in the same room as me.

LABEL: 0x5960
STRING: That said, she was bedridden without regaining consciousness at all...

LABEL: 0x59B0
STRING: It wasn't like she had any luggage or personal belongings there.

LABEL: 0x59E6
STRING: What in the world did she want from there?

LABEL: 0x5A8A
STRING: 「I left my medicine in there.」

LABEL: 0x5AB4
STRING: 「I can't function properly without them.」

LABEL: 0x5AF5
STRING: When she said "medicine," I recalled the exchange between Touri and Hiragino yesterday.

LABEL: 0x5BB6
STRING: That ampule――

LABEL: 0x5BD4
STRING: It was some medicine that even Hiragino didn't know the name of.

LABEL: 0x5C00
STRING: Tokiwa had said that it looked familiar, but...

LABEL: 0x5C38
STRING: The fact that, according to Reiri, she couldn't function properly without them only served to fan the flames of my unease.

LABEL: 0x5C88
STRING: Besides, I didn't know how much I could trust her words in the first place...

LABEL: 0x5D82
STRING: 「...I'm worried about letting you walk alone on the ship.」

LABEL: 0x5DB6
STRING: 「We don't even know where this saboteur is.」

LABEL: 0x5DE8
STRING: 「I'll go with you.」

LABEL: 0x5E92
STRING: 「Aren't you kind, Katagiri?」

LABEL: 0x5ED5
STRING: I wondered if I was reading too much into the sarcasm in her voice.

LABEL: 0x5FEA
STRING: 「That's right, Katagiri-san――」

LABEL: 0x6025
STRING: 「Yeah, yeah, it was him who saved me, right?」

LABEL: 0x605F
STRING: 「That being the case, I'd appreciate it if you could tell me what all has happened so far.」

LABEL: 0x60B8
STRING: So far...?

LABEL: 0x60DA
STRING: What more did she want to know?

LABEL: 0x6146
STRING: 「...Sure.」

LABEL: 0x61C1
STRING: 「Hiragino-san, sorry, but we're going back to the crew room for now.」

LABEL: 0x626B
STRING: 「Yeah... I'll be going back to Momoi.」

LABEL: 0x62BD
STRING: 「――I'll look forward to hearing back from you.」

LABEL: 0x62F2
STRING: As we passed each other, Hiragino whispered to me without making eye contact.

LABEL: 0x6328
STRING: The implication――

LABEL: 0x6348
STRING: 「...Yeah.」

LABEL: 0x63CE
STRING: 「I'll come with you too, Reiri――」

LABEL: 0x6403
STRING: 「Touri.」

LABEL: 0x6438
STRING: Reiri spoke to her in a sharp voice.

LABEL: 0x646A
STRING: She smiled at Touri, who had straightened her back.

LABEL: 0x6577
STRING: 「Nee-san.」

LABEL: 0x658F
STRING: 「I'm fine without you for now, so don't worry.」

LABEL: 0x65E0
STRING: She displayed her malicious trust.

LABEL: 0x65FC
STRING: A strategic smile.

LABEL: 0x6618
STRING: With her escape route cut off, Touri nodded as instructed.

LABEL: 0x66CA
STRING: 「...Well, as long as Katagiri-san's with you, it should be fine!

LABEL: 0x67AC
STRING: Yeah!」

LABEL: 0x6828
STRING: 「Reiri, don't cause too much trouble!」

LABEL: 0x686F
STRING: 「Sure.」

LABEL: 0x6929
STRING: 「Well then, take care of Reiri!」

LABEL: 0x695A
STRING: She smiled sweetly.

LABEL: 0x697C
STRING: It was like I could see nothing but her trust in me behind that smile.

LABEL: 0x69AA
STRING: 「R-Right...」

LABEL: 0x69D2
STRING: All I could do was respond vaguely.

LABEL: 0x6B09
STRING: I headed downstairs with Reiri.

LABEL: 0x6B37
STRING: Putting both of her hands on the handrail and leaning against it, Reiri descended slowly.

LABEL: 0x6B7F
STRING: The way she walked behind me while catching her breath made her look frail, or rather, seriously ill.

LABEL: 0x6C26
STRING: Nomura Reiri...

LABEL: 0x6C40
STRING: What in the world was she thinking?
